## Global Peace Index

![pic](http://images.huffingtonpost.com/2012-05-11-Global_Peace_Index_A.jpg)


## Global Peace Index

-  The level of organised conflict

-   Relations with neighboring countries

-   The level of perceived criminality in society

-   Political instability

-   Terrorist activity

-   The number of homicides per 100,000 persons

-   The level of violent crime

-   Likelihood of violent demonstrations

-   The number of jailed population per 100,000 persons

-   Nuclear and heavy weapons capability

-   Ease of access to small arms and light weapons
